plot: Imagination and naivety lead a crippled girl, to dream about becoming a dancer. On the way she discovers that society cannot accept her dream. Her confidence shatters, yet her father's love Helps her to fulfill her dream.
title: Steps
plot_es: Imagination and naivety lead a crippled girl, to dream about becoming a dancer. On the way she discovers that society cannot accept her dream. Her confidence shatters, yet her father's love Helps her to fulfill her dream.

produce.name: Bezalel Academy of Arts and Design
